00025 #define ILB_BEAST_INTERFACE_VERSION 5
00026 
00030 typedef enum {
00036         ILB_CS_GLOBAL,
00042         ILB_CS_LOCAL
00043 } ILBCacheScope;

00053 ILB_DLL_FUNCTION ILBStatus ILBSetStringEncodingImp(ILBStringEncoding encoding);
00054 
00056 ILB_DLL_FUNCTION ILBStatus ILBCreateManagerImp(uint32 interfaceVersion, 
00057                                                                                            ILBConstString cacheDirectory,
00058                                                                                            ILBCacheScope cacheScope,
00059                                                                                            ILBConstString licenseKey,
00060                                                                                            ILBManagerHandle* beastManager);
00062 
00073 static inline ILBStatus ILBCreateManager(ILBConstString cacheDirectory, 
00074                                                                   ILBCacheScope cacheScope,
00075                                                                   ILBConstString licenseKey,
00076                                                                   ILBManagerHandle* beastManager)
00077 {
00078         ILBStatus st = ILBSetStringEncodingImp(ILB_STRING_ENCODING);
00079         if(st != ILB_ST_SUCCESS) {
00080                 return st;
00081         }
00082         return ILBCreateManagerImp(ILB_BEAST_INTERFACE_VERSION, cacheDirectory, cacheScope, licenseKey, beastManager);
00083 }
00084

00113                                                                    ILBConstString beastPath);

00118 typedef enum {
00122         ILB_LT_ERROR,
00126         ILB_LT_INFO
00127 } ILBLogType;

00132 typedef enum {
00136         ILB_LS_NULL,
00140         ILB_LS_STDOUT,
00144         ILB_LS_STDERR,

00160 ILB_DLL_FUNCTION ILBStatus ILBSetLogTargetImp(ILBLogType type, ILBLogSink sink, ILBConstString filename);
00162 
00163 
00175 static inline ILBStatus ILBSetLogTarget(ILBLogType type, ILBLogSink sink, ILBConstString filename) {
00176         ILBStatus st = ILBSetStringEncodingImp(ILB_STRING_ENCODING);
00177         if(st != ILB_ST_SUCCESS) {
00178                 return st;
00179         }
00180         return ILBSetLogTargetImp(type, sink, filename);
00181 }
